issue.title: Segway silently ignores DRMAA if installed incorrectly

content.raw: I don't think I added the DRIVER_NAME_OVERRIDE part. In my branch, Segway just fails with an ImportError when SEGWAY_CLUSTER is not defined and DRMAA doesn't load.  I think printing a warning when that happens is a good idea -- currently people often forget to set SEGWAY_CLUSTER and then get very confused by the DRMAA error message.
